effect.ruby_sapphire: The target cannot switch out normally. Ignores accuracy and evasion modifiers. This effect ends when the user leaves the field. The target may still escape by using baton pass, u turn, or a shed shell. Both the user and the target pass on this effect with baton pass.
effect.emerald: The target cannot switch out normally. Ignores accuracy and evasion modifiers. This effect ends when the user leaves the field. The target may still escape by using baton pass, u turn, or a shed shell. Both the user and the target pass on this effect with baton pass.
effect.firered_leafgreen: The target cannot switch out normally. Ignores accuracy and evasion modifiers. This effect ends when the user leaves the field. The target may still escape by using baton pass, u turn, or a shed shell. Both the user and the target pass on this effect with baton pass.
effect.colosseum: The target cannot switch out normally. Ignores accuracy and evasion modifiers. This effect ends when the user leaves the field. The target may still escape by using baton pass, u turn, or a shed shell. Both the user and the target pass on this effect with baton pass.
effect.xd: The target cannot switch out normally. Ignores accuracy and evasion modifiers. This effect ends when the user leaves the field. The target may still escape by using baton pass, u turn, or a shed shell. Both the user and the target pass on this effect with baton pass.

short_effect.ruby_sapphire: Prevents the target from leaving battle.
short_effect.emerald: Prevents the target from leaving battle.
short_effect.firered_leafgreen: Prevents the target from leaving battle.
short_effect.colosseum: Prevents the target from leaving battle.
short_effect.xd: Prevents the target from leaving battle.

flavor_text.ruby_sapphire: Blocks the foe’s way to prevent escape.
flavor_text.emerald: Blocks the foe’s way to prevent escape.
flavor_text.firered_leafgreen: The user blocks the foe’s way with arms spread wide to prevent escape.
